Package com.flipfit.dao.impl

Class FlipfitPaymentDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.dao.impl.FlipfitPaymentDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlipfitPaymentDAO
public class FlipfitPaymentDAOImpl extends Object implements FlipfitPaymentDAO
MySQL implementation of FlipfitPaymentDAO This implementation uses a supplementary table for payment methods since the primary payment table is for transaction records
